scripts.local: cp src/settings/front_prd.cnf src/module/common/const.ts; cp src/settings/potter_genre.cnf src/module/common/genrelist.ts; npx webpack; node server.js
scripts.dev: cp src/settings/front_dev.cnf src/module/common/const.ts; cp src/settings/potter_genre.cnf src/module/common/genrelist.ts; npx webpack; node server.js
scripts.stg: cp src/settings/front_stg.cnf src/module/common/const.ts; cp src/settings/potter_genre.cnf src/module/common/genrelist.ts; npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bizendao:web/stg; scp ./public/.htaccess bizendao:web/stg/
scripts.biz: cp src/settings/front_prd.cnf src/module/common/const.ts; cp src/settings/potter_genre.cnf src/module/common/genrelist.ts; npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bizendao:web/bizen/; scp ./public/.htaccess bizendao:web/bizen/
scripts.flow: cp src/settings/front_flow.cnf src/module/common/const.ts; cp src/settings/creator_genre.cnf src/module/common/genrelist.ts; npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bonsoleil:web/flow/www/; scp ./public/.htaccess bonsoleil:web/flow/www/
scripts.prd: cp src/settings/front_prd.cnf src/module/common/const.ts; cp src/settings/potter_genre.cnf src/module/common/genrelist.ts; npx webpack; scp -r ./public/* bizendao:web/bizen/; scp ./public/.htaccess bizendao:web/bizen/
scripts.s3: cp src/settings/front_prd.cnf src/module/common/const.ts; cp src/settings/potter_genre.cnf src/module/common/genrelist.ts; npx webpack; aws s3 sync ./public s3://bizendao
